missingInfoDesc: Please fill in all required fields.
reportSuccessDesc: Your report has been received. Someone will contact you soon.
reportFailDesc: Failed to submit report. Please try again.
reportNextSteps: A trained professional will review your report and may contact you using the information provided.
infoSecure: Your information is completely secure and confidential
reportIncidentDesc: Please provide as much detail as you feel comfortable sharing. All fields are required.
description: Explain in detail the attack that was committed against you *
descriptionPlaceholder: Explain in detail how the abuse was carried out
privacyNotice: Privacy Notice: Your information is encrypted and stored securely. Only authorized personnel will have access to your report.
immediateDangerDesc: If you are in immediate physical danger, please call 911 or your local emergency services immediately.
